extDescription.message: Built for teachers - show students' history of edits in a Google Doc

stats_copyPaste.description: Label for number of large copy/paste instances

stats_writingSessions.description: Label for number of writing sessions

stats_activeTime.description: Label for total active writing time

tooltip_deletions.message: Deletions counts the number of times that text was removed from the document (for example, by hitting the backspace or highlighting and deleting a word or sentence).

tooltip_copyPaste.message: The number of large copy/pasted segments. Note, this only counts copy/pastes of 20 or more words and 150 or more characters.

tooltip_writingSessions.message: Writing sessions counts the distinct number of different sessions where changes were made to a document. Any breaks of more than 5 minutes count as a new session.

tooltip_activeTime.message: Active writing time measures the total time spent actively writing or editing. Breaks longer than 5 minutes are not counted.

error_notLoggedIn.message: Please sign in to Google Docs to see revision history.
error_notLoggedIn.description: Error message when not logged in

error_noAccess.message: Request edit access to document to see revision history.
error_noAccess.description: Error message when no edit access

analytics_patterns_normal.description: Message shown when no unusual patterns are detected

analytics_patterns_unusual.description: Message shown when unusual patterns are detected

tooltip_unusual_patterns_simple.message: See Details for more information about the writing patterns
tooltip_unusual_patterns_simple.description: Simplified tooltip for unusual patterns, directing to Details section

analytics_too_short.description: Message shown when document is too short for analysis

tooltip_too_short.message: Writing analysis requires at least 750 characters of text

flag_text_addition.description: Flag for unusual text addition pattern

flag_content_addition.description: Flag for unusual content addition pattern

rating_prompt.description: Prompt for users to rate the extension

analytics_warning_context.message: Note: Flags suggest reviewing the drafting process replay. They are not definitive indicators of any specific behavior.
analytics_warning_context.description: Context message shown when warnings are present

analytics_over_60.message: Over 60% of typed characters were deleted
analytics_over_60.description: Message when deletion rate is over 60%

analytics_below_threshold.description: Message when value is below threshold

analytics_above_threshold.description: Message when value is above threshold

analytics_normal_range.description: Message when value is in normal range

analytics_rapid_additions_detected.message: Multiple instances of rapid large text additions detected
analytics_rapid_additions_detected.description: Message when rapid text additions are detected

analytics_normal_typing_speed.message: Text added at typical human typing speeds
analytics_normal_typing_speed.description: Message when text is added at normal speed

analytics_content_chunks.message: $1% of total content came from large chunks ($2)
analytics_content_chunks.description: Message showing content from large chunks

analytics_session_distribution.message: $1% of content from most active session ($2)
analytics_session_distribution.description: Message showing content distribution across sessions

analytics_voice_detected.message: Multiple instances of incremental text additions detected
analytics_voice_detected.description: Message when voice-to-text patterns are detected

analytics_no_voice_patterns.description: Message when no voice-to-text patterns are found

analytics_calculating.description: Message shown while analytics are being calculated

copyPaste_none_found.description: Message shown when no copy/paste instances are found

button_show_all_pastes.description: Button text to show all copy/paste instances

button_collapse_pastes.description: Button text to collapse copy/paste list

writing_session_start.description: Label for writing session start time

button_show_all_sessions.description: Button text to show all writing sessions

button_collapse_sessions.description: Button text to collapse writing sessions list

flag_text_addition_title.description: Title for text addition pattern flag

flag_content_addition_title.description: Title for content addition pattern flag

flag_session_distribution_title.description: Title for session distribution pattern flag

flag_voice_to_text_title.description: Title for voice to text flag

tooltip_flag_editing_pattern.message: Measures how much text is deleted compared to what's added. Low deletion rates might indicate prepared content, while high rates could show extensive revisions or editing.

tooltip_flag_text_addition.message: Identifies when large amounts of text appear quickly. This can help distinguish between typed content and text that was copied from another source or added all at once.

tooltip_flag_content_addition.message: Shows when significant portions of the document were added in large chunks rather than gradually. This helps identify if content was developed within the document or prepared elsewhere.

tooltip_flag_session_distribution.message: Examines how writing is spread across different work sessions. Uneven distribution might indicate portions were developed outside the main drafting process.

tooltip_flag_voice_to_text.message: Detects patterns typical of speech-to-text tools, such as text appearing in small chunks with few deletions and distinctive error patterns.
